title: Typophile gets significant coverage on commarts.com
content:
Check it out soon cause it won't be at this address for long: [http://www.commarts.com/insights](http://web.archive.org/web/20131022102342/http:/www.commarts.com/insights).   
   
Congratulations Joe and Jared.
author: graficartist
